content.text:
# Edwardsia claparedii

* Edwardsia claparedeii
* Edwardsia claparedi (Panceri, 1869)
* Edwardsia claparèdii
* Edwardsia claperedii
* Edwardsia grubii Andres, 1883
* Halcampa claparedii Panceri, 1869
* Urophysalus grubii Costa, 1869
}}
Edwardsia claparedii is a species of sea anemone in the family Edwardsiidae.
Distribution
Found frequently in depths of 5–30 m on all western coasts of British Isles and Atlantic coasts of southern Europe to the Mediterranean Sea.Picton, B.E. & Morrow, C.C., 2010. [http://www.habitas.org.uk/marinelife/species.asp?item=D13410 Edwardsia claparedii (Panceri, 1869)]  Encyclopedia of Marine Life of Britain and Ireland.
Habitat
Burrows in mud or muddy sand.
References
